name: palpal-core
description: High-safety, OpenAI Agents SDK-compatible TypeScript library with SafetyAgent, Skills, MCP, and Chat Completions providers.

scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/test/providers.test.js && node dist/test/mcp.test.js && node dist/test/errors.test.js && node dist/test/runner.test.js && node dist/test/skills.test.js
